alert.note: Alert for Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 9:55AM EST until February 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Scioto River at Piketon. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Scioto River at Piketon. * WHEN...From Friday evening to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, flooding of several low-lying roads occurs, and backwater flooding poses serious problems in Pike and Scioto Counties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening to a crest of 25.1 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
